body.name: ODK 48 inch Gaming Desk with LED Lights & Power Outlets, Computer Desk with Monitor Stand & Storage Sheves, CPU Stand, Home Office Desk, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 18 hrs 4 mins
features: Gaming Enviroment: Our desk features a full monitor stand accommodate two monitors or laptops, built-in LED lighting create strong gaming ambiance.
Multi-Functional: Our computer desk is designed with built-in USB port for charging. Reversible pc stand shelves and a hook for your headphones make everything you need within arm's reach.

Hight-Premium: This gaming desk is constructed with a premium metal frame and thick particleboard, ensuring stability and durability. And an additional X cross bar improve the stability of this small desk.
Perfect for Small Spaces: Our writing desk with high quality and different size to choose from: 48inch/55inch/63inch, which provides ample legroom and is ideal for work, writing, studying, or gaming.

Easy to Assemble: Our working desk comes with all the necessary tools and instructions, and can be assembled in just 30 minutes. ODK has 24 hours online professional pre or after-sale service for you. Fast refund or replacement for any quality problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just built, impressed so far! Some notes!
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this a really practical, well built desk with impressively clear instructions. A few notes:Watch the orientation of the pieces! Almost none are symmetrical, and you need to align holes carefully.It’s wood and what feels like powder coated steel. While the holes are mostly well-aligned, there is some “play” and you may need to push on the metal to encourage it to bend into tighter alignment at times. Don’t tighten all the screws! Leave them looser to get the pieces to fit, and then tighten.Last, we the instructions say to mount the RGB bars at the front of the monitor shelf. We mounted them at the back and I’d recommend it. 1. There is more room in the back to spread out out the 2 light bars without bumping into the shelf supports. 2. The light is less in your face and gives the desk a nice glow. 3. They left two much slack between the the two RGB bars. Mounting in the front would leave an awkward loop of cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Good size and lighting effect is great. Outlets on the desk itself is very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, made well
reviews.reviewText: It wasn't too difficult to assemble though you have to pay attention to which side you want which shelves. They give you all the tools and parts necessary. Usually, they give only exactly what you need for screws, etc., but this came with extra parts so that there weren't any problems. The boards were a little thinner than expected but good enough. Overall I'm happy with the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk is exactly as it advertises. Was really shocked with the quality of this desk and how easy it was to put together. Everything came in the box with extra bolts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk for work or gaming
reviews.reviewText: Assembling took me about 2-3 hours to do and some parts were quite challenging to do by myself (needed someone to hold certain parts while screwing things in, but I just used my feet to hold it in place instead) so I recommend having someone there to help you build it as it would be much more convenient.The desk itself is nice and sturdy and the LED strip (many different colors as well as different tempo can be selected) adds a nice touch for night time gaming. The pillars/stands of the desk are made from metal and the tabletop portion of it is all wood. One cool thing about this desk is you can choose which sides you want the shelf on. Really love the charging outlet that is installed inside of the desk as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Assemble and Amazing Quality
reviews.reviewText: The LED lights are amazing and glow perfectly took about 2 hours to build but was also distracted so it all depends amazing desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks better in the online photos…
reviews.reviewText: Overall, the desk looks much higher quality in the online photos than in real life. Both the desktop shelf and the main desk are not single pieces of wood, but rather a panel of boards you attach together. They are not flush, and there is an especially prominent gap in the center of the desktop shelf that I will have to stare at every time I work at the desk. The pieces to attach the LED lights came broken, so I’ll have to find a way to attach besides as instructed. I won’t likely return because it was so intensive putting together and I’m not sure I’ll be able to take apart/repackage. It does seem sturdy and functional in that regard, but really disappointed with the aeathetics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk fit perfect in my son's bedroom. It looks very good in his room. It took my husband a couple of hours to put together. However, the instructions was easy to read and tools and all the materials was provided.
